extendedInfo.description: The aim of the Centurion Password Safe & Data Vault application is to create a complete security solution for Android, so much more then a password manager! Securely store passwords, user ids, phone numbers, urlâs, text, images etcâ¦ using AES Military grade encryptionFeatures Include:Creation of Secure Safes which can have Accounts created within them. The Accounts can contain the following â Text (usernames, passwords etc...)â Images (images you want kept private)â Phone numbers (make a call from app)â URLâs (visit URL from app)The application uses various hash functions and symmetric encryption algorithms such as 256bit AES and SHA to secure ALL your dataOnly YOUR password can unlock the data All the safe data is encrypted using 256bit AES encryption, for more information visit the National Institute of Standards and Technology (US NIST) Other features include: â Create unlimited Backups via SD card / Dropboxâ SMS wipe (remote wipe)â Incorrect password attempts wipes dataâ Auto logout â Auto-Launch Safes from home screenâ Unlimited Safes and AccountsThis is a Beta version and many more features are coming. If you wish to make some suggestions please contact usTags: Security, Password manager, Password, Encryption, Safe, Secure Data Storage, Credentials, Data Vault, Safe Vault
